seo.title: About SustainSage
seo.description: Meet the coaches behind SustainSage and understand the ethics that shape our UK-based practice.

hero.title: Coaches who hold space for careful change
hero.subtitle: We bring calm, honest conversations so you can think without performing.

mission.title: What guides us
mission.description: Our coaching honours agency, collective care and accountability.
bullets: ICF-aligned ethics: confidentiality, informed consent and clear agreements.
Attention to migration, race, class, gender and health realities in every session.
Partnership over prescriptions—we notice patterns with you and co-design next steps.

roots.title: Where we come from
roots.description: SustainSage grew out of lived experience relocating, rebuilding careers and supporting communities across borders.
bullets: Coaching leaders, migrants and carers across Asia-Pacific, Europe and the UK.
Years in social innovation, community development and organisational change work.
Practice shaped by multilingual facilitation and trauma-aware safeguarding partnerships.

coaches.title: Your coaches
coaches.subtitle: Co-founders who have rebuilt life in new countries more than once.

cards.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai (he/him)
cards.summary: Service designer, facilitator and coach with 12+ years supporting cross-cultural teams and public sector innovation.

cards.name: Yi-Ling Lai (she/they)
cards.summary: Learning strategist and ICF-trained coach creating language-flexible, care-centred spaces for leaders and community builders.

practice.title: How coaching feels
practice.description: We balance structure with room to adapt so your context stays central.
bullets: We begin by clarifying boundaries, pace, language and consent for data use.
Sessions weave reflection with practical planning you choose.
We review progress regularly and close well, including signposting if coaching is no longer the right fit.

boundaries.title: Clear limits keep you safe
boundaries.description: Naming what we do not provide protects your agency and wellbeing.
bullets: Coaching is not therapy, counselling, legal, financial or immigration advice.
We are not an emergency or crisis service, nor a safeguarding investigation team.
We do not act on behalf of employers or sponsors without your explicit consent.

cta.title: Curious whether we’re a fit?
cta.body: Share a snapshot of your context. We’ll suggest next steps or signpost other support without pressure.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
